__comentario__: En la interrogación se añade automáticamente el número de teléfono
consulta_android: SELECT file_path, file_hash FROM message AS m JOIN chat AS c ON c._id = m.chat_row_id JOIN jid AS j ON j._id = c.jid_row_id LEFT JOIN message_media AS md ON md.message_row_id = m._id WHERE j.user LIKE ? AND j.type = '0' AND message_type <> 0 AND file_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.timestamp
consulta_ios: SELECT fileID, relativePath FROM Files WHERE relativePath LIKE ?
